name: Ch19BBaseConvo1
_source: speak;Larachel;Father Moulder!|How wonderful to find another devoted servant of the divine!
speak;Moulder;Lady L'Arachel.|Your enthusiasm for our faith is always refreshing.
speak;Moulder;How long have you been in service to the Goddess?
speak;Larachel;Since I was but a child!|As the princess of Rausten, it is my sacred duty to spread her divine light!
speak;Larachel;And you, Father Moulder?|How did you find your calling?
speak;Moulder;It was during the great drought in Renais.|I witnessed the suffering of the people, and prayed for guidance.
speak;Moulder;The Goddess answered by sending rain.|From that day, I dedicated my life to her service.
speak;Larachel;Marvelous!|Truly the Goddess works through all of us in different ways!
speak;Moulder;Indeed she does.|The joy I find in helping others through her teachings has sustained me all these years.
speak;Larachel;Oh yes!|There is no greater happiness than bringing the Goddess's light to those in darkness!
speak;Moulder;The restoration of body and spirit through faith...|It is the truest form of healing we can offer.
speak;Larachel;Father Moulder, we must continue to spread her divine teachings!|Together, we shall banish all evil from this land!
speak;Moulder;Your enthusiasm is commendable, Lady L'Arachel.|However, remember that faith grows best when nurtured gently.
speak;Larachel;Of course!|But a brilliant light such as mine cannot help but shine brightly!
speak;Moulder;Ha ha!|Your light certainly does shine, my lady.|May it continue to guide those in need.
speak;Larachel;And may your wisdom continue to strengthen the faithful!|The Goddess smiles upon our sacred work!
